content:
I am a football fan and I am interest to know some information about the Man United club. Can you provide me with some profile information about the club?
Begin!

I'll help you retrieve the profile information for Manchester United. To do this, I'll use the clubs_get_profile_for_transfermarket function. However, I first need to know the club's ID, which typically requires the domain to be specified.

Thought: I'll use the English domain (com) and try to get Manchester United's club profile.

name: clubs_get_profile_for_transfermarket
content: {"error": "", "response": "{'internationalTeamFlag': '', 'mainFacts': {'id': '985', 'fullName': 'Manchester United Football Club', 'street': 'Sir Matt Busby Way', 'postalCode': 'M16 0RA', 'city': 'Manchester', 'phone': '+44 1616767770', 'fax': '', 'homepage': 'www.manutd.com', 'founding': 'Apr 24, 1902', 'members': '0', 'membersDate': '-', 'countryName': 'England', 'countryID': '189', 'countryImage': 'https://tmssl.akamaized.net//images/flagge/verysmall/189.png?lm=1520611569', 'avgAge': '26.73', 'squadSize': '27', 'legionaries': '19', 'internationalRank': '', 'nationalPlayer': 19}, 'stadium': {'id': '78', 'name': 'Old Trafford', 'street': 'Sir Matt Busby Way, Old Trafford', 'postalCode': 'M16 ORA', 'city': 'Manchester', 'phoneTicketCenter': '+44 870 757 1968', 'faxTicketCenter': '', 'homepage': '', 'ticketCenter': '', 'constructionYear': '1910', 'totalCapacity': '74879', 'standingRoom': '0', 'seats': '74879', 'image': 'https://tmssl.akamaized.net//images/foto/stadionnormal/manchester-united-old-trafford-2021-...

name: clubs_get_squad_for_transfermarket
content: {"error": "", "response": "{'squad': [{'height': '1,88', 'foot': 'right', 'injury': None, 'suspension': None, 'joined': 1630360800, 'contractUntil': 1751234400, 'captain': False, 'lastClub': None, 'isLoan': None, 'wasLoan': None, 'id': '8198', 'name': 'Cristiano Ronaldo', 'image': 'https://img.a.transfermarkt.technology/portrait/medium/8198-1694609670.jpg?lm=1', 'imageLarge': None, 'imageSource': 'imago images', 'shirtNumber': None, 'age': 37, 'dateOfBirth': 476406000, 'heroImage': 'https://tmssl.akamaized.net//images/foto/normal/cristiano-ronaldo-portugal-2024-1718210600-139467.jpg?lm=1718210615', 'isGoalkeeper': False, 'positions': {'first': {'id': '14', 'name': 'Centre-Forward', 'shortName': 'CF', 'group': 'Striker'}, 'second': {'id': '11', 'name': 'Left Winger', 'shortName': 'LW', 'group': 'Striker'}, 'third': {'id': '12', 'name': 'Right Winger', 'shortName': 'RW', 'group': 'Striker'}}, 'nationalities': [{'id': 136, 'name': 'Portugal', 'image': 'https://tmssl.akamaized.net//images/flagge/small/136.png?lm=...

function.arguments:
